abstract: Google announced a new feature of its Google Reader Web site on Wednesday called Google Reader Play. The updated application offers a simple, personalized view of Web content.
snippet: Google announced a new feature of its Google Reader Web site on Wednesday called Google Reader Play. The updated application offers a simple, personalized view of Web content.
lead_paragraph: Google announced an experimental Web browsing feature on Wednesday that it will offer as an alternative view to explore content on the Google Reader Web site. The company is praising its simplicity, but the advantage may be in the highly visual way it displays information.

headline.main: TV May Be the New Google Reader Play’s Best Venue

abstract: A renewed sense that Wall Street’s biggest financial companies had endured the worst of the economic downturn helped lead the stock market higher on Wednesday, The New York Times reported.
snippet: A renewed sense that Wall Street’s biggest financial companies had endured the worst of the economic downturn helped lead the stock market higher on Wednesday, The New York Times reported.
lead_paragraph: A renewed sense that Wall Street’s biggest financial companies had endured the worst of the economic downturn helped lead the stock market higher on Wednesday.

headline.main: Market Up on Sense That Worst Is Behind Banks

abstract: Alisher B. Usmanov, an Uzbek from a tiny village near the Kyrgyz border, has led the most improbable life, according to a Forbes profile. After a stint in jail, he made a fortune on plastics bags, then mining, and now the Internet.
snippet: Alisher B. Usmanov, an Uzbek from a tiny village near the Kyrgyz border, has led the most improbable life, according to a Forbes profile. After a stint in jail, he made a fortune on plastics bags, then mining, and now the Internet.
lead_paragraph: Alisher B. Usmanov, an Uzbek from a tiny village near the Kyrgyz border, has led the most improbable life, according to a Forbes profile  by Anita Raghavan.

abstract: Backed by flashy new phones and fresh software, Nokia is ready to woo American smartphone buyers all over again on price.
snippet: Backed by flashy new phones and fresh software, Nokia is ready to woo American smartphone buyers all over again on price.

headline.main: Nokia Is Coming to America — Still

abstract: Our daily roundup of Internet gems looks at a campaign to award the Nobel Peace Prize to the Internet, quantum computing and one airline’s crackdown on video chatting in the air.
snippet: Our daily roundup of Internet gems looks at a campaign to award the Nobel Peace Prize to the Internet, quantum computing and one airline’s crackdown on video chatting in the air.
lead_paragraph: Thursday’s roundup of odds and ends from around the Web, selected by the technology reporters and editors of The New York Times:

headline.main: What We’re Reading: A Nobel Peace Prize for Us All?
